Giant Tree Survival! UPDATED! - 3,696 KBBy YO BROS!
31,080 downloadspermalink
Do you LOVE punching trees? Or making your own creations? Of course you do why else would you buy minecraft. Anyway this level gives you a chance to feel like a crazy hobo that lives inside of a hollowed out tree. The only difference is theres CHALLENGES: Make a diamond pick, make a portal to the nether, Find 2 abandoned mines, Find 1 abandoned house, 1 dungeon. RULES: DO NOT BREAK THE MONSTER SPAWNERS! DO NOT LEAVE THE WOODS! KILL ZOMBIES, THEY SUCK! Keep those rules in mind and youll be fine, Good Luck!

Giant Tree Survival V2.0 - 6,634 KBBy YO BROS!
11,772 downloadspermalink
NEWEST VERSION! :D Do you LOVE punching trees? Or making your own creations? Of course you do why else would you buy minecraft. Anyway this level gives you a chance to feel like a crazy hobo that lives inside of a hollowed out tree. The only difference is theres CHALLENGES: Make a diamond pick, make a portal to the nether, Find 2 abandoned mines, Find 1 abandoned house, 1 dungeon. RULES: DO NOT BREAK THE MONSTER SPAWNERS EXCEPT THE ONES IN DUNGEONS! DO NOT LEAVE THE WOODS! KILL ZOMBIES, THEY SUCK! Keep those rules in mind and youll be fine, Good Luck!

Free To A Good Home - 24,857 KBBy demusd
108,491 downloadspermalink
I'm quitting Minecraft to spend more time with my 4-month old son. I just need someone to take care of my beloved world, cuz I'll sure miss it. This is a good world, gently lived in, with all the basics you need (connected portals, connected railway, tree farm, small mob spawner, wheat/sugar farm, branch mine). And I really love my modern home, complete with Hot Tub! So hopefully someone out there will enjoy it.
